definition: strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: The remote location, strategically located and difficult terrain, Preah Vihear Temple is quite well preserved.
sentences.chinese: 由於地處偏遠，地形險要，柏威夏寺保存得相當完好。

sentences.english: XuMaoShan is revealed that there is a dangerous mountain terrain.
sentences.chinese: 徐茂山則透露附近有一座地形險要的山頭。

sentences.english: Caught between a rock and a hard place.
sentences.chinese: 在一塊岩石和一個險要的地方之間被捉住了。

definition: to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in

sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
